Uh...hieee...hehehe.
Hey there (wink).
Hands off this instant!
Check the effects of Wyldwood Water
Hazard Pay (Expedition)
Percy Ellwood is searching for valuable Ancient Artifacts from Garden of Genesis
Search chests for Ancient Artifacts
Hm... expensive kit, air of determination in your eyes, naïve ‘I-can-change-the-world’ look about you – wouldn’t happen to be an adventurer would you, friend?
"I am indeed."

string.context: Ellwood has been working on his own for a while. He's delighted to finally see someone, and perhaps find a partner in his studies.
string.speaker: Survivalist Ellwood
string.name: SurvivalistEllwood

resources.string: Name’s Doctor Percival Ellwood. Call me Percy. I’m a collector of sorts. And you’re just the sort of folk I’ve been waiting for.

string.context: He gives the player information they need to prepare themselves for the coming dangers.
string.speaker: Survivalist Ellwood
string.name: SurvivalistEllwood

resources.string: The Ancients built this temple for their rituals. But now it’s crawling with Angry slumgullions all woken up on the wrong side of the flower bed.

string.context: Slightly undercuts his previous warnings to entice the player about the wealth to be found here.
string.speaker: Survivalist Ellwood
string.name: SurvivalistEllwood

resources.string: Still, there’s plenty relics in store for the intrepidly minded.
"So you're a thief?"

string.context: Player asks if he is merely a treasure-hunter, but he corrects the record with some backstory.
string.speaker: Survivalist Ellwood
string.name: SurvivalistEllwood

resources.string: No no. I’m a documentarian of Ancient baubles and contraptions! I have my credentials, got a certificate in Archeology from – look, does it really matter?

string.context: Sees that the player is savvier than he initially thought, and so he tries to make a mutually beneficial bargain.
string.speaker: Survivalist Ellwood
string.name: SurvivalistEllwood

resources.string: Here’s the deal, if you head in and bring out any relics you find, I’ll compensate you graciously for your troubles… What say you? Partners?
"I'll see what I can do."

string.context: Player has agreed to help him, though he intends to let them do all the work.
string.speaker: Survivalist Ellwood
string.name: SurvivalistEllwood

resources.string: That’s the spirit! I’ll be here picking the muck out of my fingernails if you need me.

string.context: Quest incomplete line, used to remind player what to do.
string.speaker: Survivalist Ellwood
string.name: SurvivalistEllwood

resources.string: Returning empty handed? Well, can’t say I blame you. Not everyone has the gumption to brave the unknown.

string.context: Player has returned victorious. Ellwood is happy he can continue his work, though his comment at the end about London could be a bit of a downbeat since no one can leave Aeternum.
string.speaker: Survivalist Ellwood
string.name: SurvivalistEllwood

resources.string: Smite my bones! You made it through! What did you find? I’ll sort and label everything, take them back to the institute in London once I escape this place.

string.context: He continues to explain his future plans, now that the player has been successful.
string.speaker: Survivalist Ellwood
string.name: SurvivalistEllwood

resources.string: I'm setting up a little museum, the souls of this island are immortal, figure the artifacts should be as well. Best not to ask how I got them all though.
Hey, it’s you again! Still lurking around these parts? I’m midway through cataloging the goods you brought last time. Talk to me later and I’ll have more work for you.
Good work on that latest haul! After I get things appraised I'll have another task for you.
Search the Arboretum Chest
Search the Northern Chest
Search the Heart of Genesis Chest
What a fine day for foraging. Agreeable weather, yes?
Greetings, my fine friend. You seem like the sort of person who might take on a task for a humble mycophile. Do you have a moment?
While these cook, may I make another request? Before you ask-- yes, I would like more mushrooms.
These will be harder to procure, but I trust you are most capable.
Death is such a profound experience. Painful, yes, considerably, but there is a moment right before all goes dark where marvelous things appear in the mind.
I am inspired, and do you know why?
I am still pondering the mystery you uncovered. I will know the truth myself, once my stew has finished cooking.
Thank you, and I hope you find your own mystery to enjoy.
A pile of haphazard journals and loose pages rests atop an empty foraging basket.
The top-most page bears a crude drawing of a mushroom and an arrow pointing toward the open end of the basket. There appears to be some cramped text beneath the drawing.

string.comment: Seam = short for POI Name "Profane Seam"
string.speaker: Auberon Gowering
string.name: AuberonGowering

resources.string: If you're headed up to the Seam, give those Corrupted a good thrashing for me.
What a mess. All my miners, chased off or Corrupted. My foremen turned on me. All that I invested to get this operation up and running-- gone!
Makes a man feel proper powerless, it does.
Ah, you're back. Just in time, too. I heard some rumbling from the mines and if I know my business-- and I do-- they found it.
Don't fret on my account. I arrived on this island dressed in rags and penniless, just like everyone else. It's as you said-- I can start again.
Doo doo doo, I'm Master Fisher Davies…
Ach, very well, very well. I guess this is supposed to prove a point that there's more to find in the water than just fish?
Thank you. Your help has been invaluable, friend. I'd say you're ready to catch most any fish in Aeternum.
Blight

The Blight is a curse of earth, and being of the earth also makes it a curse of the body as well. The fiends in Edengrove are infected by it, but the Blight infects the human body as well. It weakens you, pulling you closer to death with every breath. Be careful, you must prepare a proper defense against it when in Blighted areas of Edengrove.
"Uh... What is an 'Outpost Rush'?"

Outpost Rush is a 20 vs 20 match that takes place on a large island with three Outposts. Players compete to capture and hold these Outposts for as long as possible, increasing their team's score in the process.
"I am looking for someone, actually."
Another newcomer! Between you and ah... Miss Liu, was it? I do not feel quite so out of sorts.
"Will any other newcomers be there?"
I hear the High Sage is due to make an appearance today. You will not want to miss it!
"Have you met Han Liu?"
I know that look. A little overwhelmed, a little uncertain. There is no need. You will find only kindness here. How can I put you at ease?
"I am looking for Han Liu."

string.context: Responding to player's question about Han Liu's whereabouts. The High Seer is quite pleased with Liu and her future with the cult.
string.speaker: High Seer
string.name: HighSeerAgnes

resources.string: Ah, Miss Liu. A promising young spark, that one. She walks the path of truth now. If she returns, I am sure she will be glad to see you after such a trial.

string.direction: Delighted, very subtle subtext of menace
string.context: Subtextually would not mind if Liu dies early, as that would benefit the cult just as much as her completing the communion.
string.speaker: High Seer
string.name: HighSeerAgnes

resources.string: We all eagerly await the outcome of her communion.
"I'm ready to learn more."

string.context: Answering the player's question about Han's location.
string.speaker: High Seer
string.name: HighSeerAgnes

resources.string: I can tell you, or you can see for yourself. Follow the path to the north as it mounts the peak.

string.context: Using the idea of joining Liu to tempt the player to do something only the High Seer knows is dangerous
string.speaker: High Seer
string.name: HighSeerAgnes

resources.string: Imbue these seeds in a pool's waters and plant them in soft soil. If you are swift, you may join Miss Liu.
[Speak the Oath]
"I stand before my fellows, humbled by nature's majesty. I came with many questions, and I seek only answers."
"I give myself to the unknown, in hopes of renewing my body and soul. What may be, will be."
"I'm not sure I am ready for this."
I can't put it to words, truly, but there is… something grand here. A universal truth. A great knowing. That sounds ridiculous, but perhaps you felt it too?
The High Sage tells me he has some lessons planned for us. I cannot wait!
"She lived, but chose to join them."
I only hope we are not too late.
What on Aeternum is this cult after? It feels to me as if they are trying to get their followers killed. Oh Liu… why won't you listen?
"Here is what I collected."

string.context: Now that the player has completed all their tasks, the High Seer is hopeful they will become a true believing member of the cult.
string.speaker: High Seer
string.name: HighSeerAgnes

resources.string: Thank you. I have asked a great deal of you. It is time now for you to rest. Go now and meditate on all that you have seen.
"Can you tell me more about this cult?"

string.direction: Really believes in the Koolaid he's drinking
string.context: The Cult Leader is explaining his philosophy. Whereas other members are more cynical in using the cult to their own purposes, he is a true believer in everything he preaches.
string.speaker: The High Sage
string.name: TheHighSage

resources.string: If I were to write a pamphlet, I would wax eloquent about balance, simplicity, a life free from greed.

string.direction: Really believes in the Koolaid he's drinking
string.context: Continues explaining his philosophy.
string.speaker: The High Sage
string.name: TheHighSage

resources.string: But you are here, among us. Stay. Share our meals. Listen to our stories. Our ways are open to any and all.
"What's with the mask?"

string.direction: Really believes in the Koolaid he's drinking
string.context: Continues explaining his philosophy.
string.speaker: The High Sage
string.name: TheHighSage

resources.string: I have a profoundly ugly face. No, pardon my jest. I chose this mask to reinforce that I am nothing, indeed I am no ONE, but a conduit for the ethos of the Cult.

string.direction: Really believes in the Koolaid he's drinking
string.context: Continues explaining his philosophy.
string.speaker: The High Sage
string.name: TheHighSage

resources.string: It matters not who I am, only what I may offer.
"Are you the High Sage?"

string.direction: Really believes in the Koolaid he's drinking
string.context: Continues explaining his philosophy.
string.speaker: The High Sage
string.name: TheHighSage

resources.string: I am, though it is not a title I would have chosen for myself. I was drawn here, just like the others, but I feel I have come closest to articulating why.

string.context: Spoken as if he has only now understood the Ultimate Truth of the Universe. Putting a short, pre-life intake of breath at the start might best lean into the megalomanic absurdity.
string.speaker: The High Sage
string.name: TheHighSage

resources.string: Perhaps that is why they chose me.
"Lilian said you had a drink for me."
I take it they ah… stepped out… as it were. Here, go on, I'll put it on their tab.
"Are you Ranger Yasin's 'Love'?"
Our time together has been brief, but even I am shocked by this foolishness.
We have little to say to one another until you have completed the task at hand.

Welcome to the Dusty Coin. I'm the purveyor of this luxurious establishment. Our one and only room features four plush cots, some with "vintage" blankets. At least one of them has been laundered. Take your pick.
